doctor.name: Dr ASM Musa Kobir
doctor.info: Dr ASM Musa Kobir is a Medicine Specialist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), MRCP (UK). He is a Consultant, Medicine at 250 Bed General Hospital, Kushtia. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr ASM Musa Kobir at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
